title: Pop up notification saying masteries reset
body:
Would have been very handy.

Came home for a few casual games and a dip into ranked and got ruined because my masteries had been reset and i didn't realise.

One time when use of the popup system would have been very much appreciated.

replies.body:
THEY DID IT! THEY BLOODY DID IT!

surely this golden suggestion is worth a victorious sivir skin?
I played one game, against bots, against ONE bot and I realised instantly I had no masteries.

You got through more than a few games without realising? Play one game without realising, and that can be forgiven. Play two and you at silly. Play 3 or more games without masteries, and that's all your fault
Honestly i thought i was getting ruined because of the new build order twisting my melon.
